raw_body: DANIEL CLAUDE – Beloved husband of late Grace,​ everloving father of Conrad,​ Gerald and Cherubim,​ loving father-in-law of Wendy,​ Dushyanthi and Anita,​ affectionate grandfather of Shalomi and Yadavan,​ precious great grandfather of Yadiran,​ well loved brother of Dennis,​ Freddie,​ David,​ Ernest,​ Basil,​ Dora,​ Samson (all deceased) and Robin. Entered Rest on February 1,​ 2025. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on February 5,​ 2025 (Wednesday) from 4 p.m. to 8 p.m. Funeral Service will be held at the Parlour on Thursday February 6,​ 2025 at 3.00 p.m. followed by Burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella (Christian Section).                007907
